title: Mini-Ep 173: Dry Hands, Wet Sinks
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 173: Dry Hands, Wet Sinks
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree give their pop culture recommendations of the moment and then hear from listeners about great, drugstore-priced hand lotions, how to heal a hickey quickly, and messy face-washing solutions. Activity of the Week: Watch UCLA gy...
description:
Kate and Doree give their pop culture recommendations of the moment and then hear from listeners about great, drugstore-priced hand lotions, how to heal a hickey quickly, and messy face-washing solutions.


 Activity of the Week: Watch UCLA gymnast Nia Dennis’s amazing floor routine, which scored a 9.95 out of 10.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

FLEUR & BEE - Head to fleurandbee.com and use code FOREVER35 to get 25% off. 

 

BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.
